name: Wet Ceridwen & The Skuzz Nymphs
description:
A text-based horror game about a group of queer indie porn makers (The Skuzz Nymphs) at the beach.  Featuring some Ceridwen folklore, lots of queer family hang outs, seaweed monsters, grief rituals, the sentience of seaweed and a good dose of fucking up transphobes.

Soundtrack by Sarahsson, go check her stuff out, I love her, she's a genius & pure angel of eggwrack: https://soundcloud.com/sarahsson

Many thanks to Bryony Gillard for the invite & push to make this, for the support & for deepening my love of seaweed on so many levels. If u didn't come across this little game through Bryony's project I'd highly recommend u dive into the website for a whole host of seaweed-related art / writing goodness:

& a huge thank u to uma breakdown for being an absolute code/tech/Twine babe lifesaver. Their own work gives me so much life so go check it out ASAP: https://umabreakdown.neocities.org/games.html
